metadata.name: CA Policy Updated by Non Approved Actor
metadata.comment: Monitor and alert on conditional access changes. Is Initiated by (actor) approved to make changes? Review Modified Properties and compare "old" vs "new" value.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(message) = lower('update conditional access policy'))

output.summary: Monitor and alert on conditional access changes. Is Initiated by (actor) approved to make changes? Review Modified Properties and compare "old" vs "new" value.

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Misconfigured role permissions 2. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment. Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/architecture/security-operations-infrastructure#conditional-access
